name: [G.Tech 2] Minesweeper
description:
Here our version of the famous game MINESWEEPER, it is our first project with Unity and we took a big pleasure to develop it.

The goal of this project was to discover Unity and to enhance the classic minesweeper with some cool features in 14 days.

CONTENT
  • Original rules
  • Mouse only
  • Lights feature
  • Different difficulties
  • Camera control
  • Music and sound
HOW TO PLAY
  • Left click to reveal a block
  • Right click to flag a block
  • Scroll wheel to zoom
  • Scroll button to move the camera
